nodes.title: Add slotId based getImei() and getMeid() to ShadowTelephonyManager
Don't try to simulate Android's memory mapping for uncompressed zip entries
Move MavenDependencyResolver to its own artifact.
Simple plugin and dependency injection support
Reflector objects should unwrap invocation exceptions.
Add the ability to prevent certain networks from being updated in tests.
Fix a couple tests on windows.

Fix LocalActivityInvoker.recreateActivity. Before this CL, it calls Activity.onRetainNonConfigurationInstance() directly to obtain nonConfigInstance for the activity. This should've called indirectly from Activity.retainNonConfigurationInstances(). retainNonConfigurationInstances() also creates nonConfigInstances for fragments to prepare for the host activity recreation.
Test APIs for BluetoothSocket and BluetoothServerSocket connections.
Update robolectric location settings for Q.
Move intent filters to their own lists and out of the Package. [Reapply after rollback]
Create separate bazel build targets for each test so individual compilation is faster.
Move intent filters to their own lists and out of the Package. [Reapply after rollback]
Deprecate addResolveInfoForIntent and add more testing API that will allow easy migration to the new approach.
Move intent filters to their own lists and out of the Package.
TypedArray doesn't need a shadow in binary mode.
No longer reset the data position after unmarshalling a ShadowParcel.
Fix NPE Robolectric when a failure occurs before shadows are set up.
Fix processName setting and add few more reasonable defaults when installing new package.
Provide equals() and hashCode() in ShadowNetwork.
Test CL descriptions in copybara CHANGE_REQUEST_FROM_SOT mode
Fix Reflector class definition in Java 11.
ShadowUserManager#addUser returns a UserHandle to the user it creates

Add a Google Cloud Build CI.

Added ShadowBluetoothHeadset that implements getConnectedDevices(), getConnectionState(), and sendVendorSpecificResultCode(). Behavior of these implementations can be controlled by calls to addConnectedDevice() and setAllowsSendVendorSpecificResultCode().
Test CL descriptions in copybara CHANGE_REQUEST_FROM_SOT mode
Add disableScoring() and isScoringEnabled() to ShadowNetworkScoreManager.

Added ShadowBluetoothHeadset that implements getConnectedDevices(), getConnectionState(), and sendVendorSpecificResultCode(). Behavior of these implementations can be controlled by calls to addConnectedDevice() and setAllowsSendVendorSpecificResultCode().
Fix build. Turn off warnings for non-framework shadows.
Enhance ShadowBroadcastReceiver To Allow Testing Async Receivers
Creating a Shadow for NetworkCapabilities. The current implementation only allows operations with the transport type, and could be extended further when needed.
Add partial (backward) @Implementation of goBackOrForward(steps) to ShadowWebView
Add method to ShadowContextWrapper to expose the options of the most recently started activity
Use 'sneaky throw' technique instead of Unsafe
Add debugging info for DefaultSdk with null dependencyResolver

Allow delivering broadcasts by class name.

Refactor DefaultSdkProvider to allow plugins to customize.

remove ShadowExifInterface to allow calling actual methods.

Add javadoc for ActivityController, FragmentController and related methods in Robolectric class. Deprecate Robolectric#setupActivity in favor of ActivityScenario.

Count number of times the wakelock was held.

Adds basic MediaCodec and MediaMuxer shadows to robolectric. The MediaCodec shadow implements basic passthrough asynchronous encoding, and the MediaMuxer shadow muxes input bytes directly to the file without modification.
Update to ShadowDevicePolicyManager to allow uses-policy granting.
Update to ShadowDevicePolicyManager to enforce password restrictions.

Synchronize access to ShadowPendingIntent and ShadowUsageStatsManager fields

The entire ArrayList of listeners should have been made into a CopyOnWriteArrayList rather than creating a new one for the interation in sendSensorEventToListeners.

Adding method to allow one to attach a cameraId to a provided cameraDevice object. This cameraDevice will be returned when cameraManager#openCamera is called with the appropriate cameraId. The callback passed into the #openCamera method will also be immediately called with the provided cameraDevice object.

ShadowNfcAdapter now tracks when enableReaderMode and disableReaderMode are invoked for API 19+. ShadowNfcAdapter#isReaderModeEnabled returns the current reader mode state. Using the shadow, this can be reset using ShadowNfcAdapter#reset.
Telephony.Sms.Intents class contains a static method #getMessageFromIntent(Context) that's hard to mock or fake. The shadow allows overriding the return value by this method.

WebViewDatabase#clearFormData now tracks whether it was called or not. Using the shadow this can be reset using ShadowWebViewDatabase#resetClearFormData or ShadowWebViewDatabase#resetDatabase to clear any state.
Perform page load callbacks in ShadowWebView on UI thread.
Add shadow support for AudioManager.getActiveRecordingConfigurations. Current implementation will return null for AudioRecordingConfiguration.getAudioDevice.

https://developer.android.com/reference/android/telephony/TelephonyManager#getNetworkType() is being deprecated in Android R. All callers should switch to https://developer.android.com/reference/android/telephony/TelephonyManager#getDataNetworkType(). This change deprecates the corresponding methods (getNetworkType and setNetworkType) in ShadowTelephonyManager, and adds getDataNetworkType and setDataNetworkType methods.

This adds a basic implementation of the new notification delegate methods (setNotificationDelegate, getNotificationDelegate, canNotifyAsPackage) introduced in Q to the ShadowNotificationManager. It does not provide a complete implementation of canNotifyAsUser because the ShadowNotificationManager doesn't know how to work with contexts associated with other packages (via createPackageContext).
